entry.fragtrag: Phrynichus : 6. Δίκαιοι ἢ Πέρσαι ἢ Σύνθωκοι (title)
entry.tgrf: Phrynichus : 4a Δίκαιοι ἢ Πέρσαι ἢ Σύνθωκοι (title)
Carcinus I : test. 1 ( = Did. A1, v. 71–81)
Iophon : test. 1d, 1c ( = Sophocles II : test. 2) & 4 ( = Did. C5)
Philocles I : fr. 3 ( = Aristarchus Tegeates : fr. 5, app. test.)
Nothippus : app. test. ( = Did. A.3a, v. 13–15)
Xenocles I : test. 2 ( = Carcinus I : test. 2b, v. 3–4)
Xenocles I : test. 2 ( = Carcinus I : test. 2c)
Xenocles I : test. 2 ( = Carcinus I : test. 2d)
Xenocles I : test. 2 ( = Carcinus I : test. 3c)
Xenocles I : test. 4a ( = Philocles I : test. 8a & Theognis : test. 3)
Datis : test. 2 ( = Xenocles I : test. 5, v. 2)
Nicomachus I : test. 2 ( = Did. A2b, v. 86–89)
Agathon : fr. 32 vel Dicaeogenes (52 F 6)? = F ad. 50
Meletus II : 1 Οἰδιπόδεια (title) (app. test.) ( = Meletus I : test. 1, v. 3–5 & 7 = Did. C24)
